message.search: SELECT ms.message, ms.type FROM message ms JOIN keyword key ON ms.id = key.message_id WHERE '{0}' LIKE '%' || key.keyword || '%';

schedule.messageList: SELECT key.keyword, ms.message, ms.type FROM message ms JOIN keyword key ON ms.id = key.message_id WHERE {0} = ms.type;

sql.channels: SELECT channel_id, name, reviewer_flg FROM channels;
sql.channelStatus: SELECT * FROM channel_status as cs WHERE channel_id = '{0}'
sql.accountChannelStatus: SELECT * FROM channel_composition as cc INNER JOIN account_channel_status as acs ON cc.id = acs.id WHERE cc.account_id = '{0}' ;
sql.channelCompositionFromChannelIdAndAccoun: SELECT * FROM channel_composition as cc WHERE channel_id = '{0}' AND account_id = '{1}';
sql.channelCompositionFromAccountId: SELECT channel_id from channel_composition WHERE account_id = 'U5KL5AHC5';

update.accessCountUpDirectMessage: UPDATE account SET access_count = access_count + 1 WHERE account_id = '{0}';
update.accessCountUpChannelMessage: UPDATE account_channel_status SET access_count = access_count + 1 WHERE id = (SELECT id from channel_composition WHERE channel_id = '{0}' AND account_id = '{1}')
update.accountChannelStatus: UPDATE account_channel_status SET {0} WHERE id = (SELECT id from channel_composition WHERE channel_id = '{1}' AND account_id = '{2}')
